column4: Hello all just got a quick general uninstal. After I have uninstalled Ubuntu "don't worry I'll be installing it on VMware aftewards" will the partition on my harddrive restore it's self or do I need to do this manually?
if you just delete the parittion, you will need to remake/reformat it for whatever fileysstem you want on it.
that made no sence to me.. 'putting it on vmware....'
